MediaWiki bu aha ana-kpo program Wikipedia di gba na
Ndi Wikimedia Foundation, nde di lekota Wikipedia, bu nde di de ya
Ade wa ya na asusu programming ana-kpo PHP
Dika Wikipedia, inwere ike nweta nke gi na akwughi ugwo, maka adi ime MediaWiki e release na ihe ana-kpo GNU General Public License.
MediaWiki di kwe ndi mmadu a de he na website di gba na ya, mgbe onye nwe ya kwesi
Obu he mere Wikipedia a ga elu.
